data.title: Amersham Museum's Opening Hours, Address, Ticket Information, Travel Guides, Recommended Accommodations, and Nearby Restaurants

data.meta_description: How to explore Amersham Museum? We have information about Amersham Museum tickets, prices and fees, booking options, opening hours, transportation, maps, address, travel guides, recommended accommodations, nearby restaurants, and other useful information. You can book Amersham Museum tickets at great prices and enjoy super discounts on Trip.com. You can also explore more travel guides on Trip.com.
data.text:

Top Restaurant Picks Near Amersham Museum

1 . The Artichoke

Price : S$ 116.00Address : 9 Market Square, Amersham HP7 0DF, United KingdomDistance : 141mWhat travelers say : TheForkUser : The food was incredible, the best cod I have ever eaten and the rest was of an exceptionally high standard.Well worth a visit!

2 . The Grocer at 15

Price : S$ 26.00Address : 15 The Broadway, Amersham HP7 0HL, United KingdomDistance : 250m

3 . V's Kitchen

Address : 12 the Broadway | Old Amersham, Amersham HP7 0HP, EnglandDistance : 222m

4 . The Swan

Price : S$ 34.00Address : 122 High Street, Amersham HP7 0ED, EnglandDistance : 794mWhat travelers say : TheForkUser : Lovely gastro pub, great service, really enjoyed our food. My alcohol free cocktail exceeded my expectations. The mini desserts with hot drinks are perfect. Glad I discovered this place!



Also Popular With Visitors to Amersham Museum

1 . Westminster Abbey

Price : S$ 48.99Recommended sightseeing time: : 1-2 hoursAddress : Dean's Yard, London SW1P 3PA, United KingdomDistance : 1.02kmWhat travelers say : 嘟嘟小布丁妈妈 : Westminster, as the British royal royal church, has a version specially designed for children, children like it very much, can patiently listen to the explanation tour, the children's version is suitable for children under 7 years old.

2 . St. Paul's Cathedral

Price : S$ 42.34Recommended sightseeing time: : 1-3 hoursAddress : St. Paul's Churchyard, London EC4M 8AD, United KingdomDistance : 1.97kmWhat travelers say : maggie 830310 : It is not convenient. The electronic ticket must be printed. If there is no paper ticket, it needs to be sent to the official website mailbox on the spot and then printed. The building carvings inside are still full of shock

3 . Thames River Cruise

Price : S$ 15.29Recommended sightseeing time: : 1.5-3 hoursAddress : Westminster Pier, Victoria Embankment, London SW1A 2JH, United KingdomDistance : 740mWhat travelers say : anyaduck : The first day I arrived in London, I was just near the Tower Bridge. I wanted to take a cruise to feel the summer breeze of the evening of the Thames. I bought a ticket. As a result, I issued a ticket for ten minutes. The pier actually waited for more than half an hour. It was wasted a long time on the pier. Cruise to the second floor, the two sides of the famous buildings, the attractions have a panoramic view, there is a crew explain, just their English too food, fans can only understand some attraction names and key words, many stories or historical backgrounds really do not know the cloud...

4 . The Sherlock Holmes Museum

Price : S$ 46.67Recommended sightseeing time: : 1-1.2 hoursAddress : 221b Baker St, London NW1 6XE, United KingdomDistance : 2.85kmWhat travelers say : Damian 蔡大少 : Enjoyed the visit, but I was expecting a bit more. The house is divided in 3 floors, first floor, is the guided tour which is some explanation of two rooms. Floors 2 and 3 are at your own pace without any explanation or details
